contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Simple Guide for Creating an Azure AI Search Index in Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Parker Ovadek, from Kentico Gold partner BizStream, walks developers through the step-by-step process of adding Azure AI Search into Xperience by Kentico using Kentico's 1st party integration library. This tutorial includes everything you'd want to get started - screenshots and code!
